---
name: unified-analytics
description: Use when tracking multi-channel content performance in a single growth dashboard. Trigger when needing to monitor the North Star Metric for content operations, calculating AAARRR funnel metrics (Awareness to Referral), or attributing assisted conversions across various marketing touchpoints.
license: MIT
---

# Unified Analytics

## Quick Start

This skill helps you build unified content analytics dashboards. For complete frameworks, see the [Complete Guide](references/guide.md).

## Execution Checklist

### Building Analytics Dashboard

- [ ] Define key metrics (traffic, engagement, conversions, ROI)
- [ ] Connect data sources (GA, social, CRM, email)
- [ ] Build dashboard (Google Data Studio, Tableau, or custom)
- [ ] Set up UTM tracking for all content
- [ ] Track by content type, channel, topic
- [ ] Calculate content ROI (revenue / cost)
- [ ] Identify top performers
- [ ] Review weekly, optimize monthly

## Key Frameworks

- **AAARRR Metrics**: Awareness, Acquisition, Activation, Revenue, Retention, Referral
- **Content Attribution Models**: First-touch, last-touch, multi-touch
- **Vanity vs. Actionable Metrics**: Focus on metrics that drive decisions
- **North Star Metric**: One metric that best predicts long-term success

## Key Metrics

- **Traffic**: Pageviews, unique visitors, time on page
- **Engagement**: Scroll depth, video watch time, social shares
- **Conversion**: Leads, MQLs, customers from content
- **ROI**: (Revenue - Cost) / Cost Ã— 100

## Quick Wins

- Use UTM parameters consistently
- Track "Assisted Conversions" (content touchpoints)
- Focus on revenue metrics, not just traffic
- Weekly dashboard review ritual
